description: A couple more tweaks in the bass track.
title: Washington Is Next

description:
Corrected Lomenzo's bassline throughout the song based on the separated bass track (done with Deezer Spleeter). Changes are most noticeable in Chorus, Intro and Outro. Kept the Verses as is, since in the recording they're just eighth notes open E, so the current version is more interesting and fun to play.

Will revisit when I have some time using Kello Gonzalez's great cover from Youtube to check if I missed anything.
title: Washington Is Next

description: Changed Dave's section in pre-solo harmony. Use your thumb on 12th fret and go to 24th fret.
title: Washington Is Next
